page.title: 18Local Education.
page.content: There is no Primary school in Upton so the young children in the village have to travel by coach to primary school's in other villages.My sister has to travel to the village of Lea which is about three miles away. When I left Lea primary school I had a choice of two Secondary shools to go to.Before I left Lea school I had a chance to go to the Queen Elizabeth High School in Gainsborough but I did not qualify.My parents decided to send me to Middlefield School. At the present time the schools in Gainsborough are being re-organised and some of the shools,might close down and new ones open in their place. I hope that my school does not close down because I think it is a good school.
